Hi, I’m Riccardo Benito Desantis, I’m 28 years old and I live in Milan (Italy).

I’m currently working as a Research Fellow at the Politecnico di Milano in the MODAClouds FP7 Project.

I usually work on tons of project at the same time, but the main projects that keep me awake at night are listed in the projects page. You can see my previous posts in the posts page.

If you’re interested, you can download my curriculum vitae from this link, and you can drop me an email. In the footer you can find other options for contacting me.

R
